event.title: Premiere of the "Ada & Zangemann" movie on Ada Lovelace Day in Online, Germany

body.p: The FSFE is celebrating Ada Lovelace Day on October 8 with a special event for its supporters: the global English premiere of the animated film 'Ada & Zangemann - A Tale of Software, Skateboards, and Raspberry Ice Cream'. Originally a highly successful illustrated book, now available in 10 languages and counting, the story has been adapted into a film and is licensed as an open educational resource.

What: Ada & Zangemann English Premiere
When: 8 October, from 7:30 PM to 8:30 PM CEST
Who: FSFE Supporters + Contributors to the movie + their families
Where: Online (FSFE supporters have already received the link)
